name: Search_Hotels

dest_id.description: dest_id can be retrieved from api/v1/hotels/searchDestination(Search Hotel Destination) endpoint in Hotels collection.

search_type.description: search_type can be retrieved from api/v1/hotels/searchDestination(Search Hotel Destination) endpoint in Hotels collection.

arrival_date.description: The date on which you will arrive or check-in

departure_date.description: The date of departure or check-out.

adults.description: The number of guests who are 18 years of age or older. The default value is set to 1.

children_age.description:
The number of children, including infants, who are under 18.
Example:
Child 1 Age = 8 months
Child 2 Age = 1 year
Child 3 Age = 17 years
Here is what the request parameter would look like:
children_age: 0,1,17

room_qty.description: The number of rooms that are required. The default value is set to 1.

sort_by.description: sort_by can be retrieved from api/v1/hotels/getSortBy(Get Sort By) endpoint in Hotels collection.

categories_filter.description: categories_filter can be retrieved from api/v1/hotels/getFilter(Get Filter) endpoint in Hotels collection.

units.description: The measurement of distance in metric or imperial.

temperature_unit.description:
The temperature unit in Fahrenheit or Celsius.
c = Celsius
f = Fahrenheit

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

location.description: location can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLocations(Get Location) endpoint in Meta collection.

text.text: Read more on how payments affect the order of listed properties

props.text: Get instant access to our Genius loyalty program and enjoy discounts at properties worldwide.
props.title: Sign in and save money

response_summary:
Here’s a summary of the hotel options available in Mumbai for your stay from June 10 to June 15, 2025. There are a total of 603 properties listed, with three standout options highlighted.  

First, **Asar Elite - Sea View by Orion Hotels** is a 4-star Preferred Plus property located just 150 feet from the beach in Juhu, about 4.2 miles from downtown. Rated 8.1 ("Very Good") based on 34 reviews, it offers a room with three beds. The original price was $421, but it’s now discounted to $274, plus $33 in taxes and charges. Free cancellation is available.  

Next, **FabExpress Occazia Paradise** is a 3-star hotel in the Western Suburbs, approximately 6 miles from downtown and 4,750 feet from the beach. It features a Getaway Deal, reducing the price from $214 to $105, plus $13 in taxes. No prepayment is needed, and free cancellation is included. However, it has no reviews yet.  

Lastly, **Hotel Amber Paramount**, another Preferred Plus property, is also in the Western Suburbs, 3,650 feet from the beach. Rated 8.3 ("Very Good") from 305 reviews, it offers a Getaway Deal, lowering the price from $268 to $215, plus $26 in taxes.  

The listing also mentions that signing in could unlock additional discounts through the Genius loyalty program. For more details on how property rankings are influenced, you can explore the provided link.
enhance_func_desc: This API is ideal for travelers planning accommodations in a specific destination. It searches hotels based on location, check-in/check-out dates, and guest details, with options to filter by price, category, and sort criteria. The response includes hotel details like ratings, reviews, pricing (with discounts), and cancellation policies. Users can also apply loyalty program benefits for additional discounts. The destination ID must be obtained from the SearchDestination API.

enhanced_parameters.dest_id: Unique destination identifier from searchDestination API.
enhanced_parameters.search_type: Specifies the type of destination (e.g., CITY).
enhanced_parameters.adults: Number of adult guests (18+ years). Default is 1.
enhanced_parameters.children_age: Ages of children (under 18) separated by commas.
enhanced_parameters.room_qty: Number of rooms required. Default is 1.
enhanced_parameters.price_min: Minimum price filter for hotel search.
enhanced_parameters.price_max: Maximum price filter for hotel search.
enhanced_parameters.sort_by: Sorts results by criteria (e.g., price, rating).

hotels.description: List of hotel options available for the specified dates and location.

accessibilityLabel.description: Human-readable summary of the hotel's key features, including name, star rating, location, price, and cancellation policy.

property.description: Detailed information about the hotel property.

photoUrls.description: URLs of images of the hotel property.

position.description: Position of the hotel in the search results.

longitude.description: Longitude coordinate of the hotel's location.

wishlistName.description: Name of the wishlist where the hotel is saved.

reviewScore.description: Average review score of the hotel.

blockIds.description: List of block identifiers for the hotel.

isFirstPage.description: Indicates if the hotel appears on the first page of search results.

reviewScoreWord.description: Textual representation of the review score (e.g., 'Very Good').

isPreferredPlus.description: Indicates if the hotel is a 'Preferred Plus' property.

isPreferred.description: Indicates if the hotel is a 'Preferred' property.

mainPhotoId.description: Identifier for the main photo of the hotel.

priceBreakdown.description: Detailed breakdown of the hotel's pricing.

grossPrice.description: Total price including taxes and charges.

excludedPrice.description: Price of excluded taxes and charges.

value.description: Numeric value of the excluded price.
Numeric value of the original price.

benefitBadges.description: List of promotional badges for the hotel.

reviewCount.description: Number of reviews for the hotel.

latitude.description: Latitude coordinate of the hotel's location.

accuratePropertyClass.description: Accurate star rating of the hotel.

rankingPosition.description: Ranking position of the hotel in search results.

countryCode.description: Country code where the hotel is located.

id.description: Unique identifier for the hotel property.

optOutFromGalleryChanges.description: Flag indicating if the hotel has opted out from gallery changes.

title.description: Title or summary of the metadata (e.g., total number of properties).

appear.description: Additional components or messages appearing in the response.

fill.description: Indicates if the component should fill available space.

fitContentWidth.description: Indicates if the content should fit the width.

items.description: List of items in the content.

contentUrl.description: URL for additional content or data.
